duties_responsibilities.duty: Preparing and presenting meals in an aesthetically pleasing manner to enhance guest experience.
Maintaining cleanliness and organization of the workstation, managing supplies, and handling waste efficiently.
Adhering to local cleanliness and hygiene laws to ensure a safe and sanitary food preparation environment.
Assisting with dishwashing and other kitchen duties as required, demonstrating teamwork.

education_certification.credential: Culinary certification or relevant experience in a professional kitchen environment.
